name: Slate (bluntbladed)
description:
Slate is a choice-based narrative adventure set in the city of Riri, where you play as three different individuals, each living very different lives, however interconnected through a series of events.

Check out our game and the others made for the Digital Games for Peace Challenge:

https://mgiep.unesco.org/slate

Please play the game in fullscreen for the best experience.

Slate was made by:

Anzal

Arijit Goswami

Shourya Shukla

Himanshu Pandey

Madhavi Rathnayake
